Articles.Content: Is it me or did the forum have a little trip a couple minutes ago? I couldn't access the site because it said that there was an update and then it gave m an error saying: (forum website name) couldn't process the request. Anyone else with this?

The types of errors you saw aren't terribly uncommon, unfortunately.  We don't know the cause and probably never will.  Rest assured though that it usually very brief and generally all you have to do is refresh or wait a couple minutes.
